fields.summary: iOS: Unable to disable animations in ListView when appending multiple rows

comments.body: ListSection's .insertItemsAt() and .replaceItemsAt() methods have the same problem.

Issue reproduces on SDK Version 3.2.3 and 3.4.0

Titanium Command-Line Interface, 
CLI version 3.3.0, 
Titanium SDK version 3.2.3.GA 
Titanium SDK version 3.4.0.GA 
Appcelerator Studio, build: 3.3.0.201407111535
iOS SDK: 7.1 
iOS iPhone Simulator: 7.1
Closing ticket as duplicate as the relevant ticket is linked above.
